attributes.action: Seek acceptance by african countries to become part of the British Empire to help those within the country in terms of education, health, safety, in return for all profits from the country to be given to the British government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those nations which wish to be part of the British Empire shall be rewarded with better health care, education, safety and economy. In return we shall conscript their armed forces, any profits made by the country in question, as well as accepting prisoners to be housed in prisons in those countries and not in Great Britain. This will help those people living in their country, with better trade for the country and jobs for the people and Britain grows its armed forces, work force, land mass and international influence.
We all accept that the state of Africa is a poor one, this is a way of creating a better country, without conflict, a better livelyhood for the country in question as well as the British people being rid of Prisons on their doorsteps and the decline in our international affairs.
The countries should be run by the current democratically elected government with a few set rules put in place.
